text: Rita Süssmuth (; born 17 February 1937) is a German politician and a member of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU). == Sources == * Michael F. Feldkamp (ed.), Der Bundestagspräsident. Amt – Funktion – Person. 16. Wahlperiode, München 2007, == Other websites == * * Official biography at Bundestag.de (German, from 2002) * Interview "Education is a human right" by ERSTE Stiftung (2011) * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:German Roman Catholics Category:Politicians from Wuppertal Category:Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth ministers of Germany Category:Health ministers of Germany
title: Rita Süssmuth
